  • Sample Programs

    cel_to_fah.asm

    Declare a Celsius temperature

    Uninitialized fTemp 

                
.data
    cTemp DW 35
    fTemp DW ?

    Convert from Celsius to Fahrenheit

    Store result in fTemp 

                
.text
    mov eax, cTemp
    imul eax, 9
    add eax, 2
    mov ebx, 5
    idiv ebx 
    add eax, 32
    mov fTemp, eax
